aboutMe.title: Hello!
aboutMe.imageCaption: TangMo often use the default ‚ÄúAnemo‚Äù dragon avatar in VRChat
aboutMe.para: It‚Äôs TangMo from Thailand, living far from home. The name literally translates to ‚Äúwatermelon‚Äù. I‚Äôd be happy to chat about stuff from tech, photography, to daily dose of furry memes. I spend a lot of time on VRChat, usually as the default ‚ÄúAnemo‚Äù avatar (pictured). See ya around!

aboutChara.para: Yet another blue wolf among 23,547 others in the fandom. He‚Ä¶ exists‚Ä¶? I just put him in drawings sometimes.

reference-h.title: Vorny Note
reference-h.image_alt: A giant wolf mouth with small blue wolf resting at the inner-end of its pink tongue. There center of the tongue is dyed in white and blue, depicting the trail of where the small wolf have been.
reference-h.p1: If you‚Äôve been following me for a while, it is no secret that I am into vore and muscles. Specifically, I love being the prey in soft-vore with ideally both party having a muscular build. Goo-ey digestion is the furthest I‚Äôd go. Thus, this character is intended to be a prey, but with a fun gimmick.
reference-h.p2: When the torso area is wet, it can release some ink with the same colour as its fur pattern. If on a pred‚Äôs tongue, this ink would leave temporary mark, similar to colour from a lollipop or shush. Passerby could recognize the colour pattern and know who is inside. Despite the look, the body is {em} melting.
reference-h.p2_details: This trait was supposed to be a defense mechanism, similar that of a squid. However, the evolution has not caught up, leaving him with this ineffective power. The ink secretion is voluntary, but when startled or scared, it may be unintentionally leaked by instinct. Since the dye can only be released when wet, this wouldn‚Äôt be a problem day-to-day as the body would be dry.
reference-h.p3: Despite intending to be a prey, a few friends have already mentioned to that this character look more like a pred. In fact, I do have a super-power idea for a pred character. If you‚Äôre interested, {c}!

no-hello.meta_description: please don‚Äôt say just hello in chat
no-hello.p1: People who do this are generally trying to be polite by not jumping right into the request, like one would in person or on the phone - and that‚Äôs great!. But text chat is neither of those things. For most people, typing is much slower than talking. So despite best intentions, {s} for you to phrase your question (which is kinda annoying).
no-hello.p1_strong: you‚Äôre actually just making the other person wait
no-hello.p2: It took 9 messages to get the answer with 2 days of delay due to time zone differences
no-hello.p3: The most effective method of asking the question? Just ask the question!
no-hello.p4:
Being succinct and effective does not have to be rude,
it demonstrates respect for the other person's time.

chat.chat1_5: Can I ask you a question?
chat.chat1_7: When do we need to submit that slide?
chat.chat1_8: by midnight the night before the day
